channel.title: [317] Two Questions... Really need some help! :(
channel.description:
1. How do I change starting items - the source I used starts everyone with full gilded, a fire cape and a fury ( :confused:) how do I change the starting items to something else? (I have search for the item I.D in every file I have and it only every comes up character files and the trade log.
2. How do I de-activate spells - you can dupe in the source I used, by pulling out blood runes and telegrabbing. I want to know how I can make the telegrab spell stop working.
Please, if you know anything that can help, tell me. Even if you don't think it can help me much, it probably will.
- Surfr. =]

item.title: [317] Two Questions... Really need some help! :(
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

It finds some enchants, super heat item and some other spells but not tele grab :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 25, 2009, 05:54:14 am[/size][hr]Okay nevermind I found it.

For anyone who has searched and found this topic search for case 181 and delete all the code up to break;

i’m sure it can be fixed, but I cba attempting.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Two Questions... Really need some help! :(
item.dc:creator: @crom170 crom170
item.description:
@crom170 wrote:

to change starter go to player.java.
serch for:

playerEquipment[playerHat]

you should see somthing like this:

playerEquipment[playerHat]=1155; playerEquipment[playerCape]=-1; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerChest]=1117; playerEquipment[playerShield]=1189; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=1075; playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1291;

thats my starter
full bronze.
and the spaces u want to be empty put -1

Read full topic
